mapper.select: SELECT e.exam_no AS exam_no, e.exam_name AS exam_name, e.exam_context AS exam_context, TO_CHAR(e.exam_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS exam_date, g.user_no AS user_no, u.user_name AS user_name, g.original_score AS original_score FROM exam e INNER JOIN grade g ON e.exam_no = g.exam_no INNER JOIN user_account u ON g.user_no = u.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY e.exam_date ASC

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(exam_date, 'YYYY') AS year FROM exam e INNER JOIN grade g ON e.exam_no = g.grade_no INNER JOIN user_account ua ON g.user_no = ua.user_no WHERE g.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT exam_no, exam_name, exam_context, exam_date FROM exam
